00181 
00182 /*
00183  * Grace period is the time (in seconds) that the invoked method may be run without 
00184  * showing the HUD. If the task finishes befor the grace time runs out, the HUD will
00185  * not be shown at all. 
00186  * This may be used to prevent HUD display for very short tasks.
00187  * Defaults to 0 (no grace time).
00188  * Grace time functionality is only supported when the task status is known!
00189  * @see taskInProgress
00190  */
00191 @property (assign) float graceTime;
00192 
00193 
00199 @property (assign) float minShowTime;
00200 
00209 @property (assign) BOOL taskInProgress;
00210 
00214 @property (retain) UIFont* labelFont;
00215 
00219 @property (retain) UIFont* detailsLabelFont;
00220 
00224 @property (assign) float progress;
00225

00235 
00243 - (void)hide:(BOOL)animated;
00244 
00257 - (void)showWhileExecuting:(SEL)method onTarget:(id)target withObject:(id)object animated:(BOOL)animated;
00258 
00259 @end
